function.arg: creao nuovo task approvativo per audit subtask SAP

{"script":"import com.atlassian.crowd.embedded.api.User
import com.atlassian.jira.bc.issue.search.SearchService
import com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.Issue
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.IssueManager
import com.atlassian.jira.user.util.UserUtil
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.CustomFieldManager
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.fields.CustomField
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.MutableIssue
import com.atlassian.jira.jql.parser.JqlQueryParser
import com.atlassian.jira.web.bean.PagerFilter
import org.apache.log4j.Category
import com.atlassian.jira.util.JiraUtils;
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.status.Status
import com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor
import java.util.ArrayList;
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.index.IssueIndexingService
import com.atlassian.jira.user.ApplicationUser
import com.atlassian.jira.event.type.EventDispatchOption
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.ModifiedValue
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.util.IssueChangeHolder
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.util.DefaultIssueChangeHolder
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.customfields.option.Option
import com.atlassian.jira.workflow.WorkflowTransitionUtil;
import com.atlassian.jira.workflow.WorkflowTransitionUtilImpl;

Category log = Category.getInstance("com.onresolve.jira.groovy.PostFunction")

log.setLevel(org.apache.log4j.Level.DEBUG)
def issueFactory = ComponentAccessor.getIssueFactory()
def constantManager = ComponentAccessor.getConstantsManager()
def subTaskManager = ComponentAccessor.getSubTaskManager()
ComponentAccessor.jiraAuthenticationContext.setLoggedInUser(ComponentAccessor.getUserManager().getUserByKey("atlassian_faac_service_desk"))
def LoggedInUser = ComponentAccessor.getJiraAuthenticationContext().getLoggedInUser()
IssueChangeHolder 	changeHolder 		= new DefaultIssueChangeHolder()
IssueManager 		issueManager 		= ComponentAccessor.getIssueManager()
CustomFieldManager 	customFieldManager 	= ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager()
IssueIndexingService issueIndexingService = ComponentAccessor.getComponent(IssueIndexingService)
//MutableIssue issue = issueManager.getIssueByKeyIgnoreCase("IDTS-41160")

SearchService 		searchService 		= ComponentAccessor.getComponent(SearchService.class)
UserUtil 			userUtil 			= ComponentAccessor.getUserUtil()

MutableIssue issueParent = issue.parentObject;

 /* Create sub-task to be assigned to user */
MutableIssue newSubTask = issueFactory.getIssue()
//dobbiamo mettere il direct manager proveniente da teams
def directManagerList = []
def userManager = ComponentAccessor.getUserManager()


// CC USER
CustomField CCUser = customFieldManager.getCustomFieldObject(Long.parseLong("22252"))
def CCUserV = issueParent.getCustomFieldValue(CCUser)

CustomField CCUserAuditor = customFieldManager.getCustomFieldObject(Long.parseLong("25202"))
def CCUserAuditorV = issue.getCustomFieldValue(CCUserAuditor)

def CCUserList = []
user = userManager.getUserByName("anna.tassinari")
log.debug user
CCUserList.add(user)
user = userManager.getUserByName("monica.montecalvo")
CCUserList.add(user)
log.debug CCUserList
issueParent.setCustomFieldValue(CCUser, CCUserList)
issueManager.updateIssue(LoggedInUser, issueParent, EventDispatchOption.DO_NOT_DISPATCH, false)
issueIndexingService.reIndex(issueParent)

//issue.setCustomFieldValue(CCUserAuditor, CCUserList)
//issueManager.updateIssue(LoggedInUser, issue, EventDispatchOption.DO_NOT_DISPATCH, false)
//issueIndexingService.reIndex(issue)
//END CC USER

user = userManager.getUserByName("katia.marinangeli")
directManagerList.add(user)

CustomField WFAccount = customFieldManager.getCustomFieldObject(Long.parseLong("22256"))
def WFAccountV = issueParent.getCustomFieldValue(WFAccount)


WFAccountV.add(user)
log.debug WFAccountV
issueParent.setCustomFieldValue(WFAccount, WFAccountV)
issueManager.updateIssue(LoggedInUser, issueParent, EventDispatchOption.DO_NOT_DISPATCH, false)
issueIndexingService.reIndex(issueParent)

newSubTask.setAssignee(user)
newSubTask.setReporter(LoggedInUser)
newSubTask.setSummary(user.getUsername() + " - " + issueParent.getSummary())

CustomField fieldSoftHard = customFieldManager.getCustomFieldObject(Long.parseLong("22253"))
def fieldSoftHardV = issue.getCustomFieldValue(fieldSoftHard)
CustomField fieldSoftHard1 = customFieldManager.getCustomFieldObject(Long.parseLong("22260"))
def fieldSoftHard1V = issue.getCustomFieldValue(fieldSoftHard1)

newSubTask.setCustomFieldValue(fieldSoftHard, fieldSoftHardV)
newSubTask.setCustomFieldValue(fieldSoftHard1, fieldSoftHardV)

CustomField ReporterCompany = customFieldManager.getCustomFieldObject(Long.parseLong("20104"))
def ReporterCompanyV = issueParent.getCustomFieldValue(ReporterCompany)

newSubTask.setCustomFieldValue(ReporterCompany, ReporterCompanyV)
newSubTask.setCustomFieldValue(CCUserAuditor, CCUserList)

newSubTask.setParentObject(issueParent)
newSubTask.setProjectObject(issueParent.getProjectObject())

newSubTask.setIssueTypeId(constantManager.getAllIssueTypeObjects().find{
 it.getName() == "Sub-ApprAccount"
}.id)

def newIssueParams = ["issue" : newSubTask] as Map<String,Object>

issueManager.createIssueObject(LoggedInUser, newIssueParams)
subTaskManager.createSubTaskIssueLink(issueParent, newSubTask, LoggedInUser)
issueIndexingService.reIndex(newSubTask)

def AuditApproval = issueParent.getCustomFieldValue(customFieldManager.getCustomFieldObject(Long.parseLong("24100")))
customFieldManager.getCustomFieldObject(Long.parseLong("24100")).updateValue(null, issueParent, new ModifiedValue(AuditApproval, "1"), new DefaultIssueChangeHolder());
 
issueIndexingService.reIndex(issueParent)

","scriptPath":null,"parameters":{}}

mail.setTo(issue.parentObject.getReporter().getEmailAddress()) mail.setFrom("faacithelpdesk@faacgroup.com")
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.Issue import com.atlassian.jira.issue.comments.Comment import com.atlassian.jira.issue.comments.CommentManager
import com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor
def commentManager = ComponentAccessor.getCommentManager()
def comment = commentManager.getLastComment (issue) if (comment == null ) return false else return true|||
